resources.string: Welcome to experience the Backup Picture Tool, which is specially made by Yutao for YDan. \n1. Instructions: Please click the button:One Click, All Backup. And then all pictures will be copied to a certain folder. When it is accomplished, the path of the folder will be showed in Result-Line. \n2. Warm prompt: In order to actually save all of pictures, please reboot the phone before using this tool.
Pictures are saved in: Phone Storage
恭喜你！ \n发现了秘密的彩蛋. \n这个彩蛋是我的一些心里话，还请笑纳.
